sentences.en: Apes have dexterous ( skillful, adroitness ) hands much like ours but unlike those of any other creature.
sentences.cn: 猿有一双灵活的手,与我们的手很相似,而与其它任何生物不同.

sentences.en: As people grow older they generally become less dexterous.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增长，人通常会变得不再那么手巧。

sentences.en: He carried the others off their feet, glib, dexterous, voluble.
sentences.cn: 他叫大家发起狂来,讲得口若悬河, 伶俐乖巧, 滔滔不绝.

sentences.en: He may be dexterous at football, but he is very clumsy on the dance floor.
sentences.cn: 他踢足球可能很灵活, 但跳起舞来却十分笨拙.

sentences.en: I could help you to a schoolmistress that shall make you as dexterous as herself.
sentences.cn: 我想给你找个老师,她能教得你跟她一样熟练.

sentences.en: I was secretly afraid of him when I saw him so dexterous.
sentences.cn: 看了他那股灵活劲儿,我心里倒是暗暗有几分怕他.

sentences.en: Mr. Lin is a dexterous surgeon.
sentences.cn: 林先生是位技术纯熟的外科医师.

sentences.en: She united the knots with dexterous fingers.
sentences.cn: 她用娴熟的手指解开那些结.

sentences.en: She's very dexterous with the knitting needles.
The manager was dexterous at handling his staff.
sentences.cn: 那位经理善于运用[调配]他属下的职员.

sentences.en: The manager was dexterous in [ at ] handling his staff.
sentences.cn: 那位经理善于运用 [ 调配 ] 他属下的职员.

sentences.en: The manager was dexterous in handling his staff.
sentences.cn: 那位经理善于运用他属下的职员.
这小姑娘的手多灵巧啊.

sentences.en: We made him very merry, and I proved very dexterous in catching fish.
sentences.cn: 我们很得他的欢心, 同时我的捕鱼技术也很高明.

words.tran_cn: 灵巧的；敏捷的；惯用右手的

trans.tran_cn: （身手）灵巧的，敏捷的，手巧，圆熟，利落
trans.tran_en: skilful and quick when using your hands
